data.eml:eml: A new genus and species of anchialine Hymenosomatidae (Crustacea, Decapoda, Brachyura) from Samar, Philippines

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Husana, Daniel Edison M., Tan, Swee Hee, Kase, Tomoki (2011): A new genus and species of anchialine Hymenosomatidae (Crustacea, Decapoda, Brachyura) from Samar, Philippines. Zootaxa 3109: 49-59, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.279281
